elements.title: The information in this reporting is updated until:

elements.name: DescribeExistingEnvironmental
elements.title: Please describe the existing environmental, economic and social pressures that are likely to be significantly affected by climate change

elements.name: ImpactsKeyHazards
elements.title: Observed impacts of key hazards, including changes in frequency and magnitude

elements.name: KeyHazardsLikelihood
elements.title: Key hazards, likelihood of their occurrence and exposure to them under future climate, drawing upon the best available climate modelling science

elements.name: Vulnerability
elements.title: Vulnerability, including adaptive capacity, where adaptive capacity is defined as 'The ability of systems, institutions, humans and other organisms to adjust to potential damage, to take advantage of opportunities, or to respond to consequences'

elements.name: ValueRelative
elements.title: Share of spending used to support climate adaptation in this specific sector(relative, expressed in %)

elements.name: ValueAbsolute
elements.title: Share of spending used to support climate adaptation in this specific sector (absolute value, expressed in kEUR)
